intellimate.izou.output

Class OutputManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • intellimate.izou.output.OutputManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifiable

    public class OutputManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Identifiable
    OutputManager manages all output plugins and is the main class anyone outside the output package should talk to. It can register/remove new output-plugins and add/delete output-extensions

    • Field Summary

      Creates a new output-manager with a list of output-plugins

      adds output extension to desired outputPlugin adds output extension to desired outputPlugin, so that the output-plugin can start and stop the outputExtension task as needed.
      void addOutputPlugin(OutputPlugin outputPlugin)
      adds outputPlugin to outputPluginList, starts a new thread for the outputPlugin, and stores the future object in a HashMap

      • addOutputPlugin

        public void addOutputPlugin(OutputPlugin outputPlugin)
        adds outputPlugin to outputPluginList, starts a new thread for the outputPlugin, and stores the future object in a HashMap
        Parameters:
        outputPlugin - OutputPlugin to add

      • getOutputPlugin

      • removeOutputPlugin

        public void removeOutputPlugin(java.lang.String pluginId)
        removes the output-plugin of id: pluginId from outputPluginList and ends the thread
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the id of the output-plugin to remove

      • addOutputExtension

        public void addOutputExtension(OutputExtension outputExtension,
                               java.lang.String outputPluginId)
        adds output extension to desired outputPlugin adds output extension to desired outputPlugin, so that the output-plugin can start and stop the outputExtension task as needed. The outputExtension is specific to the output-plugin
        Parameters:
        outputExtension - the outputExtension to be added
        outputPluginId - the output-plugin the outputExtension is to be added to

      • removeOutputExtension

        public void removeOutputExtension(java.lang.String pluginId,
                                  java.lang.String extensionId)
        removes the output-extension of id: extensionId from outputPluginList
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the id of the output-plugin in which the output-extension should be removed
        extensionId - the id of output-extension to be removed

      • passDataToOutputPlugins

        public void passDataToOutputPlugins(Event event)
        gets the Event and sends it to the right outputPlugin for further processing passDataToOutputPlugins is the main method of OutputManger. It is called whenever the output process has to be started
        Parameters:
        event - an Instance of Event

      • getID

        public java.lang.String getID()
        Description copied from interface: Identifiable
        An ID must always be unique. A Class like Activator or OutputPlugin can just provide their .class.getCanonicalName() If you have to implement this interface multiple times, just concatenate unique Strings to .class.getCanonicalName()
        Specified by:
        getID in interface Identifiable
        Returns:
        A String containing an ID
